title: [REDACTED] Died!
body: Oh wait, it's just an explosion. Who wants to take bets as to how long he's "Dead". Also great work with the story Riot! Can't wait for the next one.

replies.body: I'm guessing Miss Fortune isn't satisfied because she somehow/secretly know he's alive somehow.

Yep. That denial; that unconvinced expression - that hunting down all those who sided with Gangplank; hunting him. He's weaker now.

Miss Fortune the Bounty Hunter needs proof.

> [{quoted}](name=OverpoweredSoap,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HR3IZoLZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-29T23:31:58.786+0000)
>
> I'm guessing Miss Fortune isn't satisfied because she somehow/secretly know he's alive somehow.

Why else would she demand to see the body?

GP is out there, and he's not going to be happy that someone wants to take Bilgewater from him. I think they're going to add one last chunk of story before the event ends.
Yeah, that's my thought too. Probably at the very end of the event.
He ate oranges and he'll be k
Only reason he's not back yet is cause he ate it before the slow.

* Soraka comes as she did with Irelia.
* Tahm Kench is sated and gains weight.
* Miss Fortune is satisfied ... or is she not?
* Gangplank eats an orange.
He's going to show up by the end of the week.
